site_name: Aylmer Hall, 12 Aylmer Road, Leytonstone, London, E11 3AD
description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission reference 193871 granted04/02/2020 to allow for alterations to approved roof lights to includereduction in size, repositioning and installation. Installation of an external staircase at north west elevation together with formation of a new opening and installation of a fire door at first floor. Formation of new opening at ground floor north west elevation togetherwith installation of a gate. Alteration to existing opening at ground floor front elevation and installation of a gate. Associated work to include cycle storage, cycle racks and refuse storage.
